projects.name: Gamplong Studio
projects.description: Full-featured e-commerce solution with real-time inventory management, payment integration using Stripe, comprehensive admin dashboard with analytics, product management system, and customer relationship tools. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL for optimal performance and scalability.

projects.name: PT. Nadhif Putra Sejahtera
projects.description: Modern, responsive company profile with headless CMS integration, SEO optimization, multi-language support, and dynamic content management. Features include blog system, team showcase, service portfolio, and contact forms with email automation.

projects.name: Rumah Struktur
projects.description: Interactive portfolio dashboard with dynamic content management, real-time analytics integration, project showcase with filtering, skill visualization, and visitor tracking. Includes dark/light theme support and responsive design.

projects.name: Pertenunan Astiti
projects.description: Flutter-based expense tracking app with intuitive data visualization, budget management, category-wise spending analysis, recurring transaction support, and cloud synchronization. Features include receipt scanning, spending alerts, and financial goal tracking.

projects.name: Triandi Kreasi Utama
projects.description: Comprehensive fitness tracking mobile application with workout planning, progress monitoring, nutrition tracking, and social features. Includes exercise library, custom workout builder, progress photos, and integration with wearable devices.

projects.name: Arthaloka Technology
projects.description: On-demand food delivery mobile app with real-time order tracking, payment integration, restaurant discovery, user reviews and ratings system. Features include push notifications, location-based services, and multi-language support.

projects.name: Aquadex
projects.description: Arduino-based IoT system for home automation with mobile app control, real-time monitoring, voice control integration, and energy consumption tracking. Supports multiple sensors, smart lighting, temperature control, and security features.
